message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, you can have a smaller share
I'll give you a bigger share, but I want a bit more too
I'll take most of it, you can have a small consolation prize
I'll give you the majority, but I want a bit more to hold on
I'll take most of it, you'll have to settle for scraps
I'll give you almost all of it, but I want a tiny bit to hold on
